price: 8. et celui qui aura fait ne fût-ce que le poids d’un atome en mal, le verra.
arabic: وَمَن يَعۡمَلۡ مِثۡقَالَ ذَرَّةٖ شَرّٗا يَرَهُۥ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: waman yaʿmal mith'qāla dharratin sharran yarahu
